intro.title: Your Window into Your Child's School Success
intro.subtitle: Empowering parents in Cameroon with real-time access to academic progress, school updates, and essential information, right on your smartphone.

homeTab.title: Your Personalized Home Dashboard
homeTab.benefit: Get a quick, personalized overview of your child's latest achievements, fee status, attendance snapshot, and key school updates as soon as you open the app.
homeTab.func1: Instant view of student's basic information.
homeTab.func2: Quick access to most recent results summary.

resultsTab.title: Stay on Top of Every Mark and Grade
resultsTab.benefit: Access detailed academic reports for every assessment period. Understand your child's performance in each subject, track their scores, and see their class standing.
resultsTab.func1: View sequence, term, and yearly results.
resultsTab.func2: Detailed subject-wise scores, ranks, and class averages.
resultsTab.func3: Clear presentation of overall performance and status.
resultsTab.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Parent App Academic Results Screen

analysisTab.title: Visual Insights into Your Child's Learning Trends
analysisTab.benefit: Go beyond numbers. Visualize your child's academic progress over time, identify their strengths, and see areas where they might need extra support.
analysisTab.func2: Comparison of student's average vs. class average.
analysisTab.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Parent App Performance Analysis Screen

attendanceTab.title: Keep an Eye on School Attendance
attendanceTab.benefit: Easily track your child's presence in school. View daily attendance records, summaries, and get notified about absences or tardiness.
attendanceTab.func1: Comprehensive attendance summary (rate, present, absent, late).
attendanceTab.func2: Detailed list of daily attendance records with status.
attendanceTab.func3: Filter records by date or status.
attendanceTab.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Parent App Attendance Tracking Screen

feesTab.title: Clear and Simple Fee Tracking
feesTab.benefit: Stay informed about school fee obligations. View total amounts due, payments made, and outstanding balances for each academic year, all in one place.
feesTab.func1: View fee summary per academic year.
feesTab.func2: Track total due, total paid, and current balance.
feesTab.func3: Visual progress bar for easy understanding of payment status.
feesTab.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Parent App Fees Management Screen

notifications.title: Never Miss an Important Update
notifications.benefit: Receive real-time notifications about new school posts, announcements, marked attendance, and other critical school information directly on your phone.
notifications.func1: Centralized list of all school-related notifications.

socialFeed.title: Connect with Your Child's School Life
socialFeed.benefit: See the latest news, stories, and updates shared by the school. Engage with posts and feel more connected to the school community.
socialFeed.func1: Chronological feed of school posts and updates.
socialFeed.func2: View post content, including images and media.
socialFeed.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Parent App School Social Feed

announcements.title: Receive Key School Communications Directly
announcements.benefit: Get official announcements from the school administration regarding important dates, policy changes, or urgent information, ensuring you're always up-to-date.
announcements.func1: Access a dedicated list of formal school announcements.
announcements.func2: Read full announcement content and details.

calendar.title: Plan Ahead with the School Calendar
calendar.benefit: Access the school's official calendar to stay informed about holidays, exams, parent-teacher meetings, and other important school events.
calendar.func2: Events clearly marked on specific dates.
calendar.func3: View a list of events for any selected day.

finalCta.title: Want KamerSchool at Your Child's School?
finalCta.subtitle: Share the benefits of KamerSchool with your school's administration and help bring a modern, connected experience to your community.

intro.title: Empowering Your School Administration
intro.subtitle: Explore the comprehensive features designed to streamline operations, enhance decision-making, and simplify daily management for secondary and high schools in Cameroon.

dashboard.title: Your Command Center: The Central Dashboard
dashboard.benefit: Get an instant, comprehensive overview of your school's vital signs. Track key metrics, stay updated on important news, and anticipate upcoming events.
dashboard.func4: Upcoming calendar events at a glance.

classStudent.title: Master Your Classes & Students
classStudent.benefit: Effortlessly organize class information and access detailed student profiles. Manage everything from attendance to individual progress in a few clicks.
classStudent.func2: In-depth class views: attendance, rosters (PDF/CSV), timetables, subjects.
classStudent.func3: Comprehensive student dossiers: academics, fees, discipline.
classStudent.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Class and Student Management Interface

results.title: Results & Academic Performance, Simplified
results.benefit: Streamline your entire results process from score entry to report card generation. Ensure accuracy and save countless hours.
results.func1: Easy score recording for all assessments.
results.func2: Automated calculation of averages, ranks, and overall results.
results.func3: Generate and download individual student report cards (PDF).
results.func4: Access school-wide result summaries per class/year.
results.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Results Processing and Report Card Generation

analytics.title: Unlock School-Wide Insights with Analytics
analytics.benefit: Move beyond raw data. Visualize trends, compare performance, and make informed, data-driven decisions to elevate your school's academic standards.
analytics.func2: Performance breakdowns by class, subject, and student.
analytics.func3: Identify trends and areas needing attention.
analytics.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Academic Analytics and Reporting Charts

enrollments.title: Smooth Enrollments & Transitions
enrollments.benefit: Simplify the entire student enrollment lifecycle, from new admissions to inter-class promotions and transfers, ensuring accurate records.
enrollments.func1: Efficiently enroll new students with customizable forms.
enrollments.func2: Manage student progression to new classes each academic year.
enrollments.func3: Facilitate student transfers between KamerSchool-powered institutions.
enrollments.func4: Maintain a clear, auditable history of all enrollments.

finance.title: Take Control of School Finances
finance.benefit: Gain complete clarity and control over your school's fee collection process. Reduce administrative overhead and improve financial health.
finance.func1: Define flexible fee structures for school and classes.
finance.func2: Assign fees to students and manage billing cycles.
finance.func3: Securely record and track all payments (cash, bank, mobile money).
finance.func4: Monitor outstanding balances and generate payment reminders.
finance.func5: Comprehensive financial reporting and reconciliation tools.
finance.mockupAlt: KamerSchool Fee Management and Financial Tracking

scheduling.title: Efficient Scheduling & Staff Management
scheduling.benefit: Optimize your school's daily operations with intuitive timetable creation and centralized teacher information.
scheduling.func1: Create, manage, and publish class and teacher timetables.
scheduling.func2: Maintain a comprehensive database of all teaching staff.
scheduling.func3: View teacher profiles, assigned schedules, and performance data.

communication.title: Connect & Inform Your School Community
communication.benefit: Foster a vibrant and informed school environment. Keep students, parents, and staff updated with engaging content and important news.
communication.func1: Post general school news and updates on an internal social feed.
communication.func2: Broadcast official school announcements to targeted audiences.
communication.func3: Create and manage a school-wide events calendar.
communication.func4: Administer school settings and manage staff user accounts with permissions.
communication.mockupAlt: KamerSchool School Communication Platform: Feed, Announcements, Calendar

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your School Management?
finalCta.subtitle: See firsthand how KamerSchool can simplify your daily tasks, empower your staff, and engage your parents. Schedule your personalized demo today!

FaqSection.title: Answers to Your Questions
FaqSection.subtitle: Find quick answers to common inquiries about KamerSchool and how we can help your institution.

q1_getting_started.question: How do we get started with KamerSchool? What's the onboarding process?
q1_getting_started.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply request a demo through our website. Our team will then contact you to understand your school's specific needs, guide you through a personalized demonstration, and discuss the straightforward onboarding process which includes data migration support and initial setup.

q2_setup_time.question: How long does it take to set up?
q2_setup_time.answer: The setup time can vary depending on the size of your school and the complexity of your data. However, we aim for a swift transition. A basic setup can be ready within a few days, while more comprehensive setups with full data migration might take 1-2 weeks. We work closely with you to ensure a smooth process.

q3_ease_of_use.question: Is KamerSchool difficult to learn and use?
q3_ease_of_use.answer: Not at all! KamerSchool is designed with user-friendliness at its core. We prioritize an intuitive interface that requires minimal technical expertise. Most administrators and teachers find it very easy to navigate and use effectively from day one.

q4_training.question: Do you offer training for our staff?
q4_training.answer: Yes, comprehensive training is a key part of our onboarding. We provide tailored training sessions for your administrative staff and teachers to ensure everyone is comfortable and proficient in using all relevant features of KamerSchool.

q5_support.question: What kind of support do you provide?
q5_support.answer: We offer dedicated customer support through multiple channels, including email, phone, and potentially on-site assistance for larger setups in Cameroon. Our goal is to provide prompt and effective solutions to any queries or issues you might encounter.

q6_educational_systems.question: Can KamerSchool handle both Anglophone and Francophone educational systems?
q6_educational_systems.answer: Absolutely. KamerSchool is built with the Cameroonian educational context in mind and is designed to flexibly accommodate the specific requirements of both Anglophone (GCE-based) and Francophone (Baccalauréat-based) systems, including their unique grading and subject structures.

q7_data_security.question: How secure is our school's data? Where is it hosted?
q7_data_security.answer: Data security is our top priority. We employ industry-standard security measures, including encryption, regular backups, and secure cloud hosting infrastructure. We can provide more specific details on our data protection policies upon request.

q8_parent_app.question: How does the parent mobile app work? What control do we have over it?
q8_parent_app.answer: The parent mobile app provides parents with real-time access to their child's academic progress, attendance, fee status, school announcements, and events. As a school administrator, you control what information is shared and when it's published, ensuring consistent and accurate communication.

FaqSection.moreQuestionsPrompt: Still have questions or want to see more?

CreativeCta.headline: Unlock Your School's Future Potential.
CreativeCta.subtext: See firsthand how KamerSchool transforms daily challenges into opportunities for growth and excellence. A personalized demo awaits to illuminate your path.

ProblemSolution.problemHeadline: Is Your School Ready for the Digital Future?
ProblemSolution.problemSubheadline: Embracing digital transformation isn't just about new technology; it's about unlocking your school's full potential for growth, engagement, and educational excellence.

dataInsights.title: Untapped Data: Missing Opportunities for Excellence
dataInsights.description: Valuable student and school data often remains locked in spreadsheets or disparate systems, making it difficult to gain actionable insights for driving educational improvement and targeted support.

manualPaperwork.title: Paperwork Overload: Draining Resources, Slowing Progress
manualPaperwork.description: Endless manual data entry, filing, and document chasing consume precious time and energy, diverting focus from strategic growth and enriching student experiences.

communicationBarriers.title: Disconnected Communication: Hindering Parent & Community Engagement
communicationBarriers.description: Fragmented or one-way communication channels can make it challenging to foster a truly collaborative partnership with parents and build a vibrant, connected school community.

ProblemSolution.solutionHeadline: Introducing KamerSchool: The Smart Path Forward
ProblemSolution.solutionDescription: KamerSchool provides a unified, intuitive platform designed to eliminate these frustrations, streamline your operations, and empower your entire school community to thrive.

solutionBenefits.benefit1: Unlock Actionable Insights with Powerful Analytics
solutionBenefits.benefit3: Foster Seamless Parent, Student & Staff Engagement

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This document is a template and does not constitute legal advice. You should consult with a qualified legal professional to ensure these terms are appropriate and enforceable for your specific situation and jurisdiction.

introduction.p1: Welcome to KamerSchool! These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of the KamerSchool school management platform, including our website, services, and software (collectively, the 'Service'), provided by [Your Legal Company Name, e.g., KamerSchool SARL] ('KamerSchool', 'we', 'us', or 'our').
introduction.p2: By accessing, registering for, or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you are using the Service on behalf of an educational institution or organization ('School'), you are agreeing to these Terms for that organization and promising that you have the authority to bind that organization to these terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Service.

section1.title: 1. Definitions
section1.p1: To make these Terms clearer, here are some basic definitions:

service.title: Service
service.desc: The KamerSchool platform and all related features, tools, websites, and APIs.

school.title: School
school.desc: The educational institution or organization that subscribes to our Service.

user.title: User
user.desc: Any individual authorized by a School to use the Service, including administrators, teachers, parents, and students.

content.title: Content
content.desc: Any data, text, files, information, images, or other materials submitted to the Service by a School or its Users, including student data, grades, and communications.

section2.title: 2. Eligibility and Account Registration
section2.p1: To use the Service, you must be authorized by a subscribing School. The School is responsible for creating and managing User accounts. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to keep your account information updated.
section2.p2: You are responsible for safeguarding your password and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.p1: You agree not to misuse the Service or help anyone else to do so. This includes, but is not limited to, the following:

list.item1: Probing, scanning, or testing the vulnerability of any system or network.
list.item2: Breaching or otherwise circumventing any security or authentication measures.
list.item3: Uploading or sharing Content that is unlawful, harmful, defamatory, obscene, or infringing on intellectual property rights.
list.item4: Using the Service for any purpose other than for educational and school administration purposes as intended.

schoolResponsibilities.title: School Responsibilities
schoolResponsibilities.p1: The School is solely responsible for:

list.item1: Its and its Users' compliance with these Terms.
list.item2: The accuracy, quality, and legality of all Content entered into the Service.
list.item3: Obtaining all necessary consents and permissions from parents, guardians, and staff to collect, store, and process their data within the KamerSchool platform, in compliance with applicable laws.

section4.title: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
section4.p1: Your privacy is paramount to us. Our collection and use of personal information in connection with the Service is described in our {privacyPolicyLink}.
section4.p2: We are a 'data processor' for the School's Content, and the School is the 'data controller'. We will only process data on behalf of and in accordance with the School's instructions.

schoolContent.title: Your Content Belongs to You
schoolContent.p1: The School retains all ownership rights to the Content it or its Users submit to the Service. We do not claim any ownership over your Content.

ourLicense.title: Our Limited License to Your Content
ourLicense.p1: By using the Service, you grant KamerSchool a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sublicensable license to use, process, store, reproduce, modify, and display the Content, solely for the purpose of providing, maintaining, and improving the Service for you.

section6.title: 6. Fees and Payment
section6.p1: The Service is provided on a subscription basis. The School agrees to pay all applicable fees as described on our pricing page or in a separate agreement. All fees are non-refundable, except as required by law.
section6.p2: We reserve the right to change our fees with 30 days' prior notice. Your continued use of the Service after the fee change constitutes your agreement to pay the modified amount.

section7.title: 7. Termination
section7.p1: The School may terminate its subscription at any time. We may suspend or terminate your access to the Service if you materially breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease, and we will, upon request, provide the School with an opportunity to export its Content.

section8.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
section8.p1: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED 'AS IS' AND 'AS AVAILABLE' WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE.

section9.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
section9.p1: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, KAMERSCHOOL SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, OR ANY LOSS OF DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES, RESULTING FROM YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE.

section10.title: 10. Changes to These Terms
section10.p1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. If we make material changes, we will provide you with notice, such as by sending an email or displaying a prominent notice within the Service.
section10.p2: Your continued use of the Service after such changes become effective constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

section11.title: 11. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
section11.p1: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Cameroon, without regard to its conflict of law principles. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts located in Cameroon to resolve any legal matter arising from the Terms.

section12.title: 12. Contact Information
section12.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at {email}.

introduction.p1: Your privacy is critically important to us. At KamerSchool ('we', 'us', 'our'), we have a few fundamental principles about the data we handle through our school management platform (the 'Service').
introduction.p2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect information in relation to our Service. This policy applies to all visitors, users, and others who access the Service ('Users').

section1.title: 1. Our Role as a Data Processor
section1.p1: In the context of our Service, it's important to understand the roles regarding data protection:

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.desc: The School is the Data Controller. They determine the purposes and means of processing personal data. They own and are responsible for the Content (student, parent, and staff data) they upload to KamerSchool.

processor.title: Data Processor
processor.desc: KamerSchool is the Data Processor. We process the Content on behalf of and at the direction of the School.

section1.p2: Our processing of your data is governed by our agreement with the School and this Privacy Policy.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.p1: We collect information in a few different ways to provide and improve our Service.

schoolProvided.title: Information Provided by the School
schoolProvided.p1: The School provides us with data necessary for the functioning of the platform. This includes:

list.item1: Student Information: Name, student ID, grade level, attendance records, grades, and contact information for parents/guardians.
list.item2: Parent/Guardian Information: Name and contact details (email, phone number).
list.item3: Staff Information: Name, role, and contact details for teachers and administrators.

userProvided.title: Information You Provide Directly
userProvided.p1: We collect information you provide when you create an account, update your profile, communicate with other users, or contact our support team.

autoCollected.title: Information We Collect Automatically
autoCollected.p1: When you use the Service, we automatically collect technical information, such as your IP address, browser type, device information, and usage data (e.g., features used, pages visited). We use this information to maintain security and improve our Service. This may involve the use of cookies and similar technologies.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Information
section3.p1: We use the information we collect solely for the following purposes:

list.item1: To provide, operate, maintain, and improve our Service.
list.item2: To enable communication between the School, teachers, parents, and students as permitted by the School.
list.item3: To provide customer support and respond to your requests and inquiries.
list.item4: For security purposes, to prevent fraud, and to enforce our Terms of Service.

section4.title: 4. How We Share Information
section4.disclaimer: We do not sell, rent, or trade any User's personal information.
section4.p1: We only share information in the following limited circumstances:

list.item1: With the School: All Content is accessible to the authorized administrators at the respective School.
list.item2: With Third-Party Service Providers: We use trusted third-party vendors to help us operate the Service (e.g., cloud hosting, data backup). These vendors are contractually obligated to protect your data and are prohibited from using it for any other purpose.
list.item3: For Legal Reasons: We may disclose information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with a legal obligation, protect our rights, or prevent harm.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.p1: We take the security of your data very seriously. We use a combination of technical, administrative, and physical controls to maintain the security of your information.
section5.p2: Measures include encryption of data in transit (using TLS) and at rest, strict access controls within our organization, and regular security assessments. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.p1: We retain Content for as long as the School's account is active or as needed to provide the Service. Following the termination of a School's account, we will delete or anonymize all associated personal data within a commercially reasonable timeframe, in accordance with our agreement with the School.

section7.title: 7. Your Data Protection Rights
section7.p1: As we are the Data Processor, requests to exercise your data protection rights should be directed to your School (the Data Controller). However, we will assist the School in fulfilling these requests. Your rights typically include:

list.item1: The right to access – You can ask for copies of your personal data.
list.item2: The right to rectification – You can ask the School to correct any information you believe is inaccurate.
list.item3: The right to erasure – You can ask the School to erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
list.item4: The right to object to or restrict processing – You can object to or ask the School to restrict the processing of your data, under certain conditions.

section7.p2: Your School is responsible for handling these requests. Please contact your school's administration first.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.disclaimer: KamerSchool does not knowingly collect personal information directly from children under the age of 13 without parental consent obtained by the School.
section8.p1: Our Service is intended for use by Schools, and any student data is provided and controlled by the School. The School is responsible for complying with applicable children's privacy laws, such as obtaining parental consent before collecting any personal information from children. Please see our {termsLink} for more information on the School's responsibilities.
section8.p2: If you believe we have inadvertently collected information from a child without proper consent, please contact us immediately so we can take appropriate action.

section9.title: 9. International Data Transfers
section9.p1: Your information may be stored and processed in any country where we have facilities or in which we engage service providers. By using the Service, you understand that your information may be transferred to countries outside of your country of residence, which may have different data protection rules. We will ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

section10.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section10.p1: We may modify or update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and, if applicable, through a notice within the Service. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

section11.title: 11. How to Contact Us
section11.p1: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about our Privacy Policy or our data-handling practices, please contact our Data Protection Officer at {email}.

notFound.title: Oops! This page is playing hooky.
notFound.description: It seems the page you're looking for has been misplaced in the digital backpack. Let's get you back on track.

serverError.title: A technical glitch in the system.
serverError.description: Our servers are having a moment. We've been notified and our technical team is working on fixing it. Please try again in a bit.
